name: The Golden Fork
description: Classic American comfort food with a modern twist. Burgers, steaks, and mac and cheese in a cozy setting. Great for families and casual dinners.

name: Sakura Sushi Bar
description: Fresh nigiri and sashimi, authentic ramen, and a wide selection of sake. Traditional Japanese dining with a calm atmosphere. Reservations recommended.

name: La Trattoria
description: Homemade pasta, wood-fired pizzas, and Italian wines. Family-run spot with warm service and a patio for outdoor dining.

name: Spice Route
description: North and South Indian curries, tandoori, and biryani. Vegetarian and vegan options. Bold flavors and generous portions. Lunch buffet on weekdays.

name: Taco Loco
description: Street-style tacos, burritos, and margaritas. Casual counter service and a lively bar. Late-night hours on weekends. Great for groups.

name: Le Petit Bistro
description: French bistro classics: coq au vin, duck confit, crème brûlée. Intimate setting with a small wine list. Perfect for date night.

name: Dragon Wok
description: Szechuan and Cantonese dishes: dumplings, Kung Pao chicken, mapo tofu. Spicy options and takeout friendly. No-frills, big flavors.

name: Green Leaf Kitchen
description: Plant-based breakfast and lunch. Grain bowls, smoothies, and vegan pastries. Cozy cafe with outdoor seating. Good for a quick healthy bite.
